CustomField.description: This field captures the Date/Time of the most recent contact request for an Account - as defined by Campaign Membership to a 'Contact Request' Campaign. This field is populated and maintained by a DLRS.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field captures the Date/Time of the most recent contact request for an Account - as defined by Campaign Membership to a 'Contact Request' Campaign. This field is populated and maintained by a DLRS.
CustomField.label: Most Recent Contact Request
